326127.「<pc>よ よくやったヤミィ！\n あとは 私に任せよ。:
Well done, <pc>!
Leave the rest to me!

326128.「ややっ！ そのお姿は まさしく\n 我らがスッパ党の神 邪神バルサミコス様！:
H-hey! That looks just like...our god of Sour
Power...the Dark Deity, Balsamicos!

326129.「わたくしめが 復活の儀に失敗したせいで\n 本来の姿を失われた時は どうなるこ:
I wondered what happened the last time we
tried reviving goo...but now you've finally
been resurrected!

326130.「お～ 我が信徒 ライムウェ～ル。\n コマンタレブ～？\n アナ～タのおかげで:
Well, well, if it isn't my follower, Limewell.
Comment allez-vous? I've had just a
HORRIBLE time, thanks to you!

326132.「まあ……過去のことは お酢に流しま～ス。\n 今こそ 雪辱を果たす時！\n 我:
Well, whatever... Let bygones be bygones, as
they say! Now is the time for my REVENGE!
Call over my other followers!

326134.「邪神バルサミコス……！\n まさか 復活したというのですか！？\n いったい:
Balsamicos!!
Were you resurrected...?!
How could this have happened?!

326135.「お前が スッパ党の神か……！ わしが不在の間\n ずいぶんと 暴れてくれたよう:
So YOU'RE the god o' the Sour Power! Ya caused
quite the ruckus while I was away, ya know!
I won't let ya have your way this time!

326136.「……待て待て 待てぃ！\n 我を忘れるとは じつに けしカラん。:
Wait, wait, WAIT!!
It's simply outrageous that you've forgotten
ME.

326137.「カプサイ神……！\n どうやら 助けにきてくれたというわけでは\n なさそうで:
Capsai Sin...?!
I'm guessing you aren't here to help us,
are you?

326138.「いつぞやは そこの邪神バルサミコスを\n 成敗するため 甘党と手を組んだが\n:
While it is true I joined forced with the
Sweet Tooth to rid of Balsamicos...don't
think I'll always be so sweet!

326139.「世界に君臨するに ふさわしいのは\n この辛党のみ！:
Only the Nice Spice is fit to rule this
world!!

326140.「我が党員たちも すでに\n この スウィ～ツランドに 配備済みだ。\n 甘党と:
Our members have already begun their march
into Sweetsland. The Sweet Tooth and Sour
Power shall be driven out!!

326141.「そうはさせんボチャ……！\n コテンパンにしてやるボチャ！:
Ain't happenin'! I'll beat ya to a pulp
before ya can!

326144.「……まったく 味覚を統べる３つの党が\n 互いを尊重することなく 無ヤミに争う:
Goo grief... To think the three flavor groups
would fight one another like this with no
respect for each other...

326145.「３つの味覚は ひとつとして 欠けてはならん。\n だからこそ この私……ヤミス:
All three tastes have to exist.
That is precisely why...I resurrected
Balsamicos by myself!

326146.「ヤミスライム……？\n ま…まさか あなた様は……\n グルメ神 ヤミースライ:
Wait, you're...
C...can it be...? No... Yummy Slime, the
Great God of Gourmet?!

326147.「グルメ神～？\n すべての味覚を司る トレビア～ンな神が\n このスライムだと:
The Great Gourmet...? So this little slime
is the tres bien deity of all tastes...?

326148.「ようやく 気づきおったヤミィか。おまえたちは\n ただヤミくもに 自分の党のこ:
So goo've finally realized. You're all just
thinking about your own tastes...
Learn to be a bit more cooperative!

326153.「邪神バルサミコス様！ 大変です！\n スッパ党員たちを 呼び寄せたのですが\n:
Lord Balsamicos! This is bad! I summoned our
Sour Power members, but they all look really
strange...

326155.「オ～ノ～ン！ わたすは ここでス～！: Oh noo! I am right here!

326156.「こ…こいつが 邪神バルサミコス様っ！？\n 我らが神と 党員たちに\n いった:
Y...You're Lord Balsamicos?! What the heck
happened to everyone in Sour Power?!

326157.「罰を 与えたまでよ。\n スウィ～ツランドにいる ３党の党員たちの姿は\n こ:
They've been punished! It was my doing to
change the appearance of the three of them
here within Sweetsland.

326158.「元の姿に戻したければ 私のクイズに挑戦し\n 誰が党員であるかを 言い当てよ。:
If you wish to see them back to normal, goo
must take my quiz and guess who belongs!

326159.「そうして 党員すべての姿を\n 元に戻すことができれば\n おまえたちの姿も:
If all members are returned to normal,
then you all shall as well.

326160.「そ…そんなの おいらたちだけじゃ 無理カボ！\n <pc>……パパうえを みん:
There's...there's no way we can do this alone!
<pc>... For my papa, for everyone...
Please help us change them back!

326161.「……<pc>よ 私からも頼む。\n じつは おぬしに ここへ来てもらったのは\:
I will ask goo as well, <pc>.
The truth is that I asked you to come here
because I had foreseen this.

326162.「彼らが 調和の大切さを知るには\n スウィ～ツランドとは 異なる世界に身を置く:
For them to understand true harmony, they have
to learn it from someone who isn't from
Sweetsland. Someone untouched by taste...

326163.「おぬし以外にも 参加者を募るゆえ\n ３党のいずれかに所属し みなで協力して\:
I will recruit others as well. Choose one of
the three taste groups to join, and work
together to solve my goo-iz!

326164.「……あっ そういえば <pc>に まだ\n 手伝ってくれた お礼を渡してなかっ:
Oh, that reminds me...
I hadn't given you this yet to thank you.
Please take it!

326165.「……まさか ヤミスライムがグルメ神で\n こんなことに なるなんて\n 思って:
To think that Yummy Slime was the Great
Gourmet. I never would've guessed...

326166.「<pc> どの党に所属するか 決まったら\n おいらに 話しかけてほしいカボ。:
Once you decide which taste group you want
to join, come back and speak with me!

328304.「スウィ～ツランドに 着いたカボよ。\n あとで おいらに 話しかけてほしいカボ:
We're here in Sweetsland!
Come and talk to me when you can!

331950.だが 問題は まだ残っている。\nヤミスライムの クイズに挑戦し\n３党の党首た:
However, the problem yet remains. Tackle
Yummy Slime's quiz to return the three
leaders back to their original selves!
